dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5784 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2650 North Doctor Martin Luther King Drive in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, as the “Vel R. Phillips Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Moore (for herself, Mr. Sensenbrenner, Mr. Duffy, Mr. Pocan, Mr. Grothman, Mr. Gallagher, Mr. Kind, and Mr. Ryan of Wisconsin) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2650 North Doctor Martin Luther King Drive in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, as the Vel R. Phillips Post Office Building.

section.header: Vel R. Phillips Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2650 North Doctor Martin Luther King Drive in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, shall be known and designated as the Vel R. Phillips Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Vel R. Phillips Post Office Building.
